item.title: Apple brings Apple Intelligence with iOS 18.1 dev beta, but there are a lot of limitations
item.description:
Users will be able to get the first taste of Apple Intelligence as Apple has started to make some of the features of its AI suite available with the iOS 18.1 developer beta released Monday. The company launched Apple Intelligence at its Worldwide Developer Conference (WWDC) in June. However, the first set of developer beta […]

item.title: Canva acquires Leonardo.ai to boost its generative AI efforts
item.description:
Canva has acquired Leonardo.ai, a generative AI content and research startup, as the company looks to deepen its investments in its AI tech stack. The financial terms of the deal weren’t disclosed, but Canva co-founder and chief product officer Cameron Adams said it’s a mix of cash and stock. All of Leonardo.ai’s 120 employees will […]

item.title: Self-driving tech company WeRide accelerates global expansion as transportation industry adopts AI
item.description: WeRide said it is the only company which has driverless permits from the U.S., China, UAE and Singapore, and plans to enter more markets.

item.title: Microsoft Finally Puts Xbox 360 Store Out to Pasture - Gizmodo
item.description:
1. Microsoft Finally Puts Xbox 360 Store Out to Pasture  Gizmodo
  2. As the Xbox 360 marketplace enters its final day, one former exec pays tribute to the beloved store: "All good things must come to an end"  Gamesradar
  3. Act fast! Xbox 360 Marketplace closes forever today — 7 games I’d buy from less than $1  Tom's Guide
  4. The Xbox 360 Store shuts down today.  The Verge
  5. 19 Years Later and Microsoft Have Killed the Xbox 360 Marketplace, and It’s a Sad Day for Gaming  imdb
